website_summaries.verdict: This extra-wide gate has a versatile length capacity and is designed to offer a better fit with your decor.
pros: Can stretch from 38" to 72" in width
Gate looks good if you are planning to use it for a permanent install
Double locking system to help keep kids from figuring out how to open the gate
Hardware created to mount on an angled wall if needed
cons: There is a bottom rail under the gate on this model, which can become a tripping hazard
Installation can be a bit tricky

customer_reviews.title: Supergate Deluxe...EXTENDED!!
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to what most believed, there is an extension option. Since I found out the 72" was not quite long enough to go around my back door that swings outward, instead of returning the Supergate that I bought at a discounted open box item, I did some research and took a chance with the 2 panel extension (discounted open box) for the 'Superyard 3 in 1 Metal'. I used a phillips screw driver to take out the plastic end pieces of one of the panel from the extension and switched them around to make it connect between the gate panel and the 18" short panel...voila! Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: JonathanV

customer_reviews.title: Not 72"!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this gate for a smaller opening and love it. Of course I purchased another one for a new house with a 72" opening between rooms. This thing is just short of 72" and will not work without spacers or thin strips of wood. I've got a 3D printer so I'm able to fill the space with a color matched spacer that is the same dimensions as the mount but not everyone will be able to do this. Make sure your opening is no more than 71 1/2" before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Rebeiro

customer_reviews.title: Just installed this and it works great. I did need the 15" ext
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this and it works great. I did need the 15" ext, but it all more or less worked as advertised. The only real issue I have so far is with the 2 stickers in Spanish on the rails which were not easy to remove, I had to scrape these of slowly with my fingernails and then cleaned with goo-off. Only other thing was that Amazon recommend by "Frequently bought together" some "wall saver for baby gates" which totally to not work with this product. A minor ~11 dollar loss, but not sure why Amazon recommends purchases for incompatible products. So far I recommend the product, but suggest you ignore the "Frequently bought together" advice for this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dillon

customer_reviews.title: I actually love the gate
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the gate, but can't find the correct way to contact customer service regarding an issue i have with the latch so I'm using this platform. I've had the gate for over a month now and ever since receiving the gate the upper latch only works about 20% of the time. I have to constantly tap on it to get the latch to reset. I was hoping with time that it would correct itself, but that doesn't seem to be the case. Could you possibly send me a new latch to correct this issue? Please contact me when you get the chance. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: ZAnderson

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: This gate is dangerous for small dogs! BOTH of my little dogs got their heads stuck between the bars and it was very scary and dramatic getting them out. The bars are close enough together but because they are flexible, a dog is able to squeeze their head through and then get stuck. I checked on my other baby/pet gate and this was not the case with that one...that one had very sturdy bars that could not be moved at all. This should be constructed the same way but is not, making it very dangerous for small pets.
customer_reviews.author: lo

customer_reviews.title: No 3D printed spacers needed!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Im mainly wiritng this review to report that the product now has extendable bottom pieces where it attaches to the wall closest to the floor in case you have wood molding on the floor. Therefore you do not need to buy these 3D printed spacers that people are talking about in other reviews. Will fit all doorways!. The only reason i gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the gate doesnt screw into the floor and there for it moves a little at the turning sections if you push it, but not that much. Still does the job well!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Installation has several problems
customer_reviews.text: "Hardware included" is a claim that only applies people mounting into wood. For anyone mounting this into a wall, you will have to go to the hardware store to buy the correct sized drywall anchors. Yes they are very cheap, it's a shame North States doesn't just include them. The lower brackets do not fit up against standard 4" baseboards. It leaves about a half cm gap between the bracket and the face of the trim. The screws that are included will strip easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gogh Me

customer_reviews.title: Not 72 inches
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to receive this item. The quality of this gate was very good for the price. However I was very disappointed because the space it was intended for is 70 inches across and this gate claims to be 72 inches. We had to attach boards onto each side of the wall to make it fit because it was 2-3 inches too short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This gate was _exactly_ what we needed to secure an extra-wide archway and keep our dogs from rushing us at the front door as soon as we get home. The two "wings" bend to fit our unique doorway perfectly. We don't have it secured to our wall, but instead have one side placed between a large hutch and a partial wall. No matter, it stays in place well. We really like that it only requires one hand to open and then swings lightly closed on its own. The aged bronze color looks almost black, which fits our decor well and looks so much classier than white or plastic. This was a purchase I'm very happy with even a year later!
customer_reviews.author: Jada Petersen

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A OK PRODUCT AT BEST IN MY EXPERIENCE. NOTICE THE PETITE LITTLE ASIAN MOM HOLDING A PETITE LITTLE ASIAN CHILD ON THE BOX PICTURE. A PETITE LITTLE ASIAN CHILD IS ALL THIS GATE IS GOOD FOR. MY BIG BAD ASS USA TODDLER TORE THIS THING OFF THE HINDGES FIRST DAY. THIS IS A CUTE GATE. WANT SOMETHING MORE SERIOUS, U MIGHT WANNA LOOK ELSEWHEE. I WILL GO TO THE HARDWARE STORE AND TRY TO FIND SOME HEAVY DUTY CLAMPS TO STRENGTHEN IT. THIS THING IS OVERPRICED.
customer_reviews.author: guitarmike82

customer_reviews.title: Latch broke in 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Installation is a pain, but doable for 1 person. Latch/button inoperable after 2 months. North States less than helpful, wanted me to uninstall and return entire gate for a replacement. Hey North States, if your product is defective, perhaps you should be more proactive in fixing the customer service issue? We'll never buy from them again, and we've mentioned it to all the parents we know that this is NOT a good option. If it was durable enough to hold up, it would be a great product. But when it's broken you're on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Arctic Altoid

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but a good product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased with the gate. It’s ability to accommodate wide spaces without extension pieces, but rather angled sides makes it look really nice. I took one star off for a few reasons- 1. It’s not true white. It’s more cream/off white. 2. Despite being drilled into studs, it’s still slightly wobbly. 3. I wish it was a few inches taller. Overall, the piece of mind it provides for the price is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CarlyR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect and super sturdy. We got this gate to separate our adult Doberman from our little German Shepherd puppy. Normally Dozer can figure out how to get gates open, this one he cannot. Husband said out of all the gates we’ve had this one is by far the best quality. Easy to open and close. From another reviewer, hubby used his own screws rather than the ones that came with it. He also said this was the easiest install he’s done yet on gates. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I love this. We use it to keep our dog from going upstairs. When he was a puppy, we also used it to keep him in certain rooms. He can definitely jump over it, he’s a golden retriever. But he’s knows he’s not supposed to. The only thing I don’t like about it is you have to have the sides angled at least 45°. Maybe a little more. If they’re not angled enough, it easily tips over. There are hardware pieces to attach it to the wall, but we don’t want to do that and it wouldn’t really work for our area. But I love how wide it is and that it can stand on its own
customer_reviews.author: Cheri M.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the quality
customer_reviews.text: We didn't even bother installing this gate as it arrived damaged from the factory. One of the screws holding the bottom hinge together was broken, (clearly snapped when it was installed at the factory) and fell out as I was removing it from the box. Normally I'd just replace the screw, and not give it another thought. But the broken screw got me looking closely at the whole thing. At first it appears to be well made. But the double latching mechanism is weak, doesn't operate smoothly, and just seems like a failure waiting to happen. Couple that with its price point, and the cheap (soft) metal hardware. We just couldn't justify keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT TODDLER PROOF! THIS IS NOT TODDLER PROOF! THIS IS NOT TODDLER PROOF!
customer_reviews.text: The gate is made out of pretty sturdy material, HOWEVER, the brackets that attached to the wall ARE NOT CHILD PROOF. The mechanism is a clip that retracts and is suppose to fit over the mental "peg" (see photos). My two year old son walked right up, shook it up and down a few times, and the clip released and he pulled the gate right off from the wall (see video). I think I can still make the gate work if I go to the hardware store and find a different solution to attach it. Beware, as is.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lucchese

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This gate is flimsy and wobbles. The top of the gate doesn't latch on its own, only the bottom. Its in a busy doorway and I have to slam it to get it to shut and that doesn't always work. If one of the other kids go through the gate, then the baby can escape, because it won't latch. Very disappointed. I bought another larger gate from the same company(for another doorway) and it's sturdy and works properly. This one doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE, not white!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this product. I saw the photos in reviews some looking white and others looking biege. I ordered the soft white expecting it to be white since my walls, trim, and other gates are white. I take it out of box and it's an awful dirty old looking white, I check the box and it says linen as the color. Which is different than white. It reminds me of a white that has been used for decades purchased at a yard sale. I'm so disappointed as there were other cheaper options that were legitimately white and I choose this because I liked the arch and removability. They should advertise the correct color.
customer_reviews.author: KAITLYN

customer_reviews.title: favorite gate
customer_reviews.text: this is one of my favorite gates and I own two. I use them in my dinning room and playroom door ways and my playroom door way is 5ft wide, this is perfect. I love that it attaches to the wall with its mounts but the entire gate can come off mounts and gate can be cleared from door way when needed and the mounts are still in place in wall, and when we want to have gate up easy peasy! Hands down one of my fav. I docked it stars only because it asked me to rate for stairs, I haven't used this on the stairs, but for my area of stairs it be to big.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ethier

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking, Works Perfectly, and Wonderful Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (did it myself), durable, great for wider spaces, love it’s look, easy to use, love the removable and fold flat feature for when you need it completely out of the way, and the price is great! I’m a happy Mama with this baby gate... knowing my littles are safe, so I can quietly, quickly, and easily slip away for a few moments to get something done... ALONE for a few minutes! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good gate--flexible configuration
customer_reviews.text: This is a very convenient gate. The hinged sections made it easy to fit it in a 5'4" opening and square it up with the neighboring walls. It's sturdy enough for my Corgi but I would think twice before using it for a large dog. I did not have any problems with the basic installation. The baseboard adjustment made it unnecessary to shim the top bracket. My only complaint was that the gate latch didn't line up right after installation. In addition to using the built in latch adjustment, I had to add a 3/8" shim under the hinge closest to the latch in order to bring it into alignment.
customer_reviews.author: pierop

customer_reviews.title: Sanity Saver.. if you have a puppy!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Simple to open, close and keep secure when necessary. I purchased this to keep my mini-aussie from snooping around the front of the house and taking secret tinkles :) At the time I also had a sick parent that was in and out of the hospital. Luckily the wide gate is designed so that you can lift it out of hinge on one end and swing it out of the way, giving a wide berth for people (or stretchers sadly). Overall, this is well designed product and I'd buy again, should I need one.
customer_reviews.author: LAE

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Would totally recommend. I have a weird shaped first step on my staircase so I could not pick a simpler gate, but I’m 100% happy with this one and would choose again. You hear a click when the gate is locked, it stays open if you push it all the way open, and it is not easy for the toddler to open.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Smith

customer_reviews.title: no trouble installing
customer_reviews.text: When I read previous reviews, I had my doubts.. cheap screws, not easy to install. Well, I used different screws right off. The template wasn't a lot of use as the "floor" line was about 1/2 inch too low for my floor. After a very minor adjustment, I had the gate installed in about 20 or so minutes. Its a great gate for our pets. They cannot push it over like the tension gate we had before. Our opening is 59 inches wide so I knew it would curve out a bit. I recommend checking to see how far it would curve out if your opening is less than 72 inches. I would highly recommend this gate.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Doggett

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this gate to keep our little Shih Tzu from getting out on our lanai and possibly falling in our pool. We use it between two sliding doors so it really isn't attached to any wall. We velcro it to the door handles and it rests in the slider track for more support. It works great for our need and having the opening gate function is terrific. Opens easily and closes well. Stepping over our old gate was becoming a real challenge and hazard when trying to get to and from the lanai. Really glad we found this option. Worth every penny to us!
customer_reviews.author: Flagirl16

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: The gate is very light weight, and has a large entrance. After it was installed, it is a very sturdy gate. It should do the job. Just ok because... It was very easy to knock over before installing it, just isnt very sturdy. The bar welding looks spotty. The white plastic pieces and the white paint on the metal do not match. The plastic looks yellowed in person. The bottom of the gate does not have plastic bumpers like the other Noth States gate I have. This one seems to be lower quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Good but get drywall anchors
customer_reviews.text: Love this gate. Easy to open for adults, not for kids. Looks better than a regular, plain gate. Stay open feature is helpful. One thing I love though is that if you let it swing closed, it locks EVERY TIME. Sometimes with other gates it will close but not quite latch and lock. That's not the case with this gate. I recommend using drywall anchors if you plan to screw this into your wall. After a few weeks in a high traffic area, the screws came out of our wall on one side (other side is drilled into cabinet- no issues there.) We added anchors and have had no problems since.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We actually have bought a few of these gates. Some for inside the house and also added a few outside on our deck with another type of fencing that we purchased here on Amazon. We used brackets to hold the gate and panels together. These gates do come with other accessories to screw into the walls but we didn’t use them, just zip-ties to hold everything together. I don’t believe these are considered water-resistant, but so far, so good. Gates outside still work after 2 months of use. They are easy to open and close with one hand. Actually what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Debi C.

customer_reviews.title: Toddleroo safety gate...
customer_reviews.text: Is strong well build with little mistakes but still... quality is good door lucks really good easy and comfortable for everyday us... you will bot be able to move door to right or left i had to buy additional pice to make my wired project done. there was no water dispenser when I install it.
customer_reviews.author: LeVaN

customer_reviews.title: they just don't work right
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty, but it is very hard to get them to bend properly at the angles, and I am actually afraid to position them properly because I think they will break. Difficult to install, and the latches don't work right--they are hard to click closed and even harder to open. I bought two of these and am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great but disappointed the price went up
customer_reviews.text: I have had this gate for 11 months. I am very pleased. My husband had no problem installing. It keeps my monsters (aka 2 & 3 yr old boys) out without any problems. They haven't figured out how to open it like 2 other gates and they haven't broken it like yet another gate. In fact this is the only gate out of 4 that they haven't conquered in some way. I actually came back to order another one and am disappointed that the price has gone up. I paid $76 w/ prime, 11 months ago and now the price is up to $90 w/ prime. Not cool Amazon... free shipping indeed.
customer_reviews.author: NYCmom

customer_reviews.title: I like this gate alot better then other ones
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased brown color by mistake but we end up liking it lol. Gate's bottom hinge can be adjusted since most of the wall don't line up evenly. Gate seem to be more sturdy then others. I like the design and craftsmanship. Wish they added shorter screws one they provided seem to be little too long
customer_reviews.author: Jcendless

customer_reviews.title: Not for doorways smaller than 72'
customer_reviews.text: The gate does not actually fit the range of openings it advertises. Instead it must be anchored to a wall (you cannot have any floor trim to anchor correctly) and the angled at the two hinge points. So if you are expecting to have this at the top of a set of stairs, prepare to have the gate 2 feet into the room as it won't actually fit a smaller opening than it's max size.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Judkins

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gate. I have a 2 year old who is always on the go. I originally had a gate on the steps that didn’t have a door and the older (and heavier) he got it became more challenging to climb over. After researching for a long time we found this gate. Our steps as you can see are wide and there aren’t any good options for banister to banister. I ended up purchasing a universal banister to banister gate attatchment. That didn’t work properly but it came with these thick zip ties that ended up working perfectly. What I love is this gates door shuts and locks automatically most times. It’s well made, sturdy, and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Msanchez4

customer_reviews.title: It does what it’s supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: This gate arrived timely and packaged well. Easy to unpack and assemble. The gate looks nice and does the job for which it was purchased. I gave it four stars for installation because it definitely took two people. Our opening is 93” so we had to purchase an extender along with the gate. I gave it three stars for sturdiness because it slides back and forth on our hardwood and has actually caused a few light scratches. It has, however, stood up to my Labrador standing up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, rugged, almost adult-proof
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed it for. The opening we needed it for is awkward, the walls are narrow and the base trim is odd; our refrigerator is adjacent to this opening so we needed a gate low enough to still be able to open the door, the ability to make this gate various shapes works great. Definitely won't have to worry about the toddlers figuring out how to open this gate considering most of our adult guests have a hard time working it, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jrsme

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are the best!! I installed two of these on different entrances to close off a room. The kids played in the room hours every day for 2 years and they’ve held up great. I love that you can completely remove it from the space when you feel like it. My toddlers, who can figure everything else out, never figured out how to open these gates. These are a great quality, fit large openings and will last for years!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sturdy to toddler abuse, worth price! 10/10
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality gate for any area. I put it on my back deck to gate the stairs for the dog and toddler, year round and it is holding up well. Also moved inside for getting off a room. Only thing is the latch has been slammed/ attempted to be pried open (toddler) and it has weakened and has to be manually closed shut or slammed even harder but it will latch, just weaker than before. Again it has held up to some abuse and is very sturdy and easy to install. Never doubted it being between my toddler and a set of stairs. I also purchased extension to fit large deck stairway.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: easy to install in a wide doorway
customer_reviews.text: this installed and worked well from the start. that is for the first month. then the automatic close feature didn't any more. I adjusted it (as far as possible) and it helped a little, but we still basically have to slam it. it does the job though and my son has not been able to break through it or open it. we have another gate that he has amazingly figured out how to open the safety latch to allow the gate to be opened. but it takes him a bit to do it, so we can catch him before he gets through!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Takes a bit of finesse to get it mounted
customer_reviews.text: So far it contains the children and the corgi. I love that it closes automatically. It took a bit of finesse to get it mounted and adjusted to close on it's own, but it's been great the past couple of days. My only complaint: The template that came with it is a fantastic idea, but our template seemed like it was a quarter inch too tall from the top plate to bottom plate. So only one wall has extra screw holes in it. So the templates need to be rechecked on their end. Just make sure you measure your gate hinges to make sure that is the right length between the mounting plates.
customer_reviews.author: Hmm. Ok.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't mount the way I wanted it to
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a temporary setup to keep the dogs out of our bedroom. I needed something more permanent, and this looked like it would to the trick. But, when I got it mounted, it was about four inches off the floor, which made it very difficult for my wife to get her walker over it. In the end, I ended up putting it on the floor and only using the upper mounts. Those give it enough stability that it doesn't move easily but keeps the bar across the gate sitting on the floor so it's less of an obstacle.
customer_reviews.author: pschmehl

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted over 7 years
customer_reviews.text: Just looked in my orders since my gate is starting to fall apart so I can reorder a new one and I realized I bought this in 2013 so it has lasted 7 years with 2 English mastiffs and a Great Dane 😳 also the only thing wrong is that one of the hinges came apart so it still works but with my big boys I need it to be sturdy again so I will be recording the exact same gate
customer_reviews.author: Aimee H.

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive width accommodation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this gate to fit our odd/wide staircase of 43". Everywhere in the descriptions it is stated to fit 38.3-72"...HOWEVER!!! IF the opening you wish to gate is SMALLER than 72", you will need to angle the gate at the pivot points. In my case, this completely nullifies the use of the gate. I struggled for a while trying to figure out how I was going to make this gate work, until I read ahead in the directions booklet and found a small and simple mention of this little tidbit. I am SO disappointed because it really is a beautiful, quality gate. This caveat should be made more widely known to the consumers.

customer_reviews.title: Decorative Pet Gate
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this gate. I will the say the first time we used it was to gate our Havanese puppy up in the kitchen while we were gone for the day. We were quite surprised to have her great us at the door when we got home. She was just a tad too small, not quite 5 lbs., and managed to squeeze through the bars. But now it works perfectly and I love the way it looks. We just leave it up now and when we need to leave she knows that the kitchen is home for just a little while. Would definitely recommend this gate.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gate
customer_reviews.text: Having purchased several subpar quality gates at Walmart and other places, I was getting frustrated trying to figure out how to keep my aggressive cat separated from the other two. Plus, it's hard to find a gate that would fit in our extra wide doorway. This one fits, it folds to fit different size doorways, and it's a good quality. It also looks really nice in the house. The cats don't jump over it. I love the walk-through door that closes on its own, as well. I've paid close to this price for something way worse. I use the crappy one in my closet now, and this amazing one to protect my cats. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this gate, my husband put it up in less then 30 minutes. We have a toddler that climbs on everything so we were trying to find a gate that would keep him out of our dinning room which was 69 and half inches across.. Love that it has an auto automatic close feature. It does shake a tad when both my kids are laying into it, but that doesn't bother me like I said its a very wide opening.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for an outside gate at the end of my deck. It is definitely not sturdy and hard to figure out how to fit the space you need it to go. The gate is basically a metal gate that feels like it’s swinging when you go to open it. It’s not sturdy and barely holds in a 12lb dog, I can’t imagine trusting this with a child. It also rusted the very first time it rained. And the ends pop out of the small clip where it attaches to the wall constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Gate works great...don't like the threshold in the opening.
customer_reviews.text: This gate works well, and will fit the openings described. Mine was slightly wider, but I was able to mount the gate on small plates that helped it bridge the gap. I didn't put this up for dogs or kids...I put it up for the older set that visits so they won't tumble into my sunken living room. The only problem is that the gate has a threshold of about 1 1/4" across the opening. Since I liked everything else I modified it myself by cutting out the threshold and welding a piece of 1/8" steel across the bottom of the opening. Now it's easier to traverse and I don't worry about our older friends tripping and falling.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Nepon-sixt

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great gate to keep my dogs out of our very expensive Nerd Corner. Took a little to get it in the wall, but following the directions only took about 30 minutes. Key thing we missed: make sure it's on the ground. We put ours above the baseboards and it's got a little give to it, but it still does the trick! It's a beautiful finish and look to it, doesnt cut off the room.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great gate for corralling pets
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gate after the birth of my son to keep our pets out of the sunroom. We needed a wide gate to span across the space between the room and rest of the house. This gate is very sturdy, the dog can’t get through it and the cats don’t try to jump it or wiggle through. The only slight drawback is that it is kind of a pain to open with one hand because you have to push the button and lift up pretty hard on the gate door. We manage though. As the gate is in a high traffic area, it looks really nice so we aren’t embarrassed when guests come over! :-)
customer_reviews.author: LT_Balt

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but a little light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more carefully about the adjustability of this gate. Because I just needed something quickly, I didn't look at the details. This is not a gate you can adjust to fit BETWEEN walls or stair pillars, etc. you have to use the full 72 inches and then bend at the hinges. It's a little awkward and is definitely not has sturdy as I would have hoped, but it is doing the job. You have to attach it to the walls though, with anchor bolts. So if you are looking for an easily removable, movable partition, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: arlah

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Getting the gate lined up where it will open and close consistently is pretty tedious. Fortunately it offers lots of micro adjustment points, but it took an hour to get it in an acceptable state. The gate can swing open and close itself most of the time now, but the bottom piece doesn't always snap in. I ordered a discounted warehouse open box gate that was like new, but no mounting hardware was included. Had to order hardware from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: jgsu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gate for odd spaces
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep my dog away from the front window...mostly because she destroyed the window sill (she struggles with barrier issues sometimes, the sill damage is obvious). Anyway, the gate went up very easily once I figured out where to mount the separate banister rail piece to protect my stairs (sold separately). She has jumped up on it several times since it’s been installed and it has held up to her every time. Really appreciate the adjustable end pieces that attach to the mounts as well as the ability to be mounted at angles since my opening was not a full 72” wide.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the gate we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gate -- for people with small children and small dogs. Or well-behaved dogs. It comes with the necessary hardware and instructions for a fairly uncomplicated installation. It is sturdy and easy to open and close with one hand. The one thing we did not consider? Larger, determined dogs sail right over the top. We may need a jail cell.
customer_reviews.author: Tamalyn Kralman

customer_reviews.title: Still not sure.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I like this gate. It looks nice. The width is NOT adjustable!!! It has two joints where the gate bends to fit your space, sort of like a bay window. The bowed out gate works in our space by chance, but I can imagine several scenarios where this would be a problem or annoying in other spaces. The gate door doesn't close smoothly which is annoying. I have to be very careful closing it and wiggle it around to get it shut. I really like that the gate can be removed from the wall hinges but it is hard to put back onto the hinges lately. I'm indifferent about this gate at best.
customer_reviews.author: L H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome structure and style  Keeps my dogs where they should be
customer_reviews.text: This is great for keeping my dogs out of the living room when I’m not home. Sturdy enough that the cats can jump on and over it to go where they want to. It took me a little bit to get it installed just how I wanted it to be. It a little bit of a unique entry and spacing. But this works great and looks great too. Easy closure and stays locked. You can leave the gate open and it will stay. Glad I invested in this product
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wide Opening Barrier
customer_reviews.text: We used this gate to contain our pets when our elderly parents visit and it works. It blends well with the house and it keeps all four dogs safely in the office area when the parents are here. It's easy to install. We like it because it's permanent. No levers or rubber bumpers to have to wedge into the wall. The dogs cannot push it over and escape. The gate is easy to use and stays open when you want it to. This gate has worked very well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Co Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly stands up to jumping dogs
customer_reviews.text: For my space perfectly. My actual space measure a bit smaller than these dimensions but it ended up fitting perfectly. MUST ATTACH BOTTOM HOLDERS INTO BASEBOARDS. I had originally drilled holes above baseboards but the gate wasn’t wide enough. I actually needed to put the bottoms piece into the baseboards then fit perfectly. It’s really easy to open and close and once I figured out baseboards issue was super easy to I stalle as they provided a template. This actually holds up to my dogs or other dogs jumping up on it. Very happy. Only wish it came in other color options.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful gate, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful gate, high quality. I've had 8 kids and been through many gates and this was by far one of the nicest. I unfortunately am returning it because within minutes of installation my 18 month old was able to get right up there and get over it. My other children were older when they started climbing over everything so this may work fine for others and would be great to keep dogs in or out. My teenage son installed in a couple minutes so installation is easy, he didn't use the template though, just took another reviewer's advice and put the bottom brackets on first where we wanted them and then put the top ones on after.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 7

customer_reviews.title: Looks great outside on the porch!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this gate to put on our front porch to keep the dogs from running out the door and into the street. It is quite effective at this! The dogs can hang out up front with us now and watch people walk by and will not risk getting out (they are 15 pounds and small dogs). The neighbor kid also comes up to them and he cannot get in (the latch is fairly child proof) and cannot jump over. The material is strong and looks nice on the porch; much nicer than plastic baby gates you see in stores. This looks like it belongs on our porch in between the stained wood. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY one that was right size
customer_reviews.text: I guve this 5 stars 'cause it's the exact size we needed and does the job. We installed (with modification) on the opening of our front porch so our dog can be out when we sit outside. This work, but it's lacks being "solid" to withstand say an adult yanking the gate to open, the latch should be different. As it is, you can feel it's not made for heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: CheshireKitty

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought something was strangely wrong until I realized there are adjustments at the bottom of wall mount brackets. After I finally figured out what I was doing wrong, it mounted perfectly and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Sturdy once you mount gate to the wall. It doesn't separate like other gates or expand. It's all 1 piece, let me try to explain. . There is 2 areas that pivot so you can fold the gate up. You use those to areas to move out the gate so it fits across. If the opening isn't perfect for gate to fit straight across the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gate
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice gate, it is well made and looks nice too. I got it to contain my dogs, since we are building we thought we would take a couple of short cuts installing, that was a bad idea. Even if it’s temporary it is important to install properly, my lab knocked it out of the wall, without proper installation. Not the gate’s fault, just saying do it right if you want it to work right. It’s a nice gate. It works well and is one of those that can’t be climbed, though it might could be jumped depending on the height of the jumper.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: This was the longest baby gate I could find for a decent price and even then I had to use a couple wooden blocks to make up the couple inch gap. This extends across a den/playroom entry way to keep my rambunctious son locked up if we need him contained for a short time. I like the locking mechanism and it’s actually pretty sturdy fully extended. Works for us.
customer_reviews.author: J. RecTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and safe - recommended
customer_reviews.text: Needed a baby-proof stair gate to span two side-by-side staircases... one going up and one going down. Bought extra panels to extend it into a ‘D’ shape to give plenty of room to enter/exit away from the stairs. Followed fitting instructions and it worked perfectly. Very sturdy construction with nice feel for baby - no apparent sharp edges. Gate opens easily and closes on its own. I am an engineer, so pretty fussy about construction of things I buy... this product gives me total confidence. Just one note... the ivory color really is ivory, not white. This was a little unexpected, but actually blends better than pure white, so we were very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: BFfan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, seems pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking gate & it seems sturdy. What I don’t like about it is the latch, so many of these gates are hard for me to open & close. I found some other gates that are easy for me to open but this one takes two hands because you have to push the button & lift at the same time. It may just be me that can’t open this type of latch easily.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality screws
customer_reviews.text: What i like is that it is visually appeasing. The construction seems like good quality. What i dislike is that it is difficult to lineup straight. Also, the screws are cheap. WARNING!!!...DO NOT use the fastening screws that come with the gate, they will strip and you wont be able to screw or unscrew it. I had to cut the head off and use a vice grip to remove the screw. Im thinking about sending it back, but i want to try installing with other screws first.
customer_reviews.author: Bertie

customer_reviews.title: Great for odd fitting spaces
customer_reviews.text: Before I found this gate I thought it would be impossible to fit a baby gate in the area we needed it. We had our dogs in kennels while we were out running errands because I couldn't enclose them in an area small enough not to do major damage as they love to do, but this gate is perfect! The walls we needed to connect the gate didnt line up, and were about 3 feet apart. This gate fits perfectly, and now our love bugs can be together in a comfortable area when we are out. Life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Munzie

customer_reviews.title: It works and looks nice too
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to install (You will need a drill). And it opens easily and shuts by itself. Keeps my dogs in the “right” side of my house and they cannot run out when I open the front door
customer_reviews.author: MN in Florida

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. However its not sturdy. After a week. The gate became loose and now i had to put extra lock around it because my 11mnth old figured if she pushed hard enough the door opens. So yup. Dnt recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Works so great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It fits our unique stairway top that has a diagonal wall on one side. It is easy for adults to open. Challenging for my 4 yr old. Easy for adults to remove and replace as needed. My very bright 1 yr old can’t open it and he gets into almost everything we try to keep him out of.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The finish is rich and beautiful. Installation was a snap (measure twice; drill once). Wall anchors are not included, but in many installations (i.e., if installed within pass through doorways) you won't need them. Unlike one of the reviewers I did not find the screws weak. I drilled holes slightly smaller than the screw diameter and they went in just fine and did not strip. The gate is sturdy, opens easily and locks automatically when it is closed. I raise service dogs so I was looking for something that would last, was reasonable in price and works well. This satisfies all those criteria.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bogenrief

customer_reviews.title: Not meant to be used with baseboards!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not meant to be used with baseboards! Unfortunately it causes the gate to have slack and not open or close with ease.... not sure what to use with baseboards on an opening this wide honesty. We bought this to keep our little one out of the kitchen. We have very little cabinet space currently, so it’s hard to keep her out of things she shouldn’t be getting into.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Option
customer_reviews.text: We had an awkward corner to our hallway/entrance to our kitchen and stairway that we wanted to block. This gate was perfect. You can tell it is quality material and the fact that it shuts and fastens again on its own makes it perfect for family with bigger kids coming and going frequently. We had previously purchased a Regalo gate and it was garbage, we ended up returning it because several pieces were broken on arrival. We also put a gate in our basement from North States and have been equally pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Russell B.

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep dogs at bay.....
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver to keep our dogs from attacking the front door every time a package arrives or someone stops over... LOVE IT. Like that the door is wide as well and will stay open if you open it all the way. If you don't extend it however it closes behind you...PERFECT so my little friends stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, heavy, but mounting hardware needs work
customer_reviews.text: The gate itself is beautiful, and feels heavy and solid. The mounting hardware inspires less confidence. I don't think the gate is going anywhere, but it has little bit of wiggle where it connects to the mounting brackets. Additionally, are the screws made of aluminum? Two of them lost their heads going in, so I have a bracket held in with one (non-supplied) screw and two headless shanks. I tried to get the shanks out, but the material squished under the pressure of pliers so I couldn't get a grip on it. The gate seems solid enough somehow, so far!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality gate
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and style of this gate. It is designed well to accommodate different thickness baseboards which some of their other gates aren't. Install is relatively straight forward. The door only swings one way which can be a good or bad thing. I personally like the doors on their "easy-close gates" better, but overall this is a nice product. The only negative I would say is the color is more of an almond white (some yellow) as opposed to a pure white.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The extension should come with it.
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is pretty pricey and to not have the extension come with it my price was $84.00 paying for the gate now I have to spend another $30.00 for the extension I think they should at least have one extension with it then if you need more extensions for the gate then they can pay for an extra $30.00
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER L BOWMAN

customer_reviews.title: good quality, solid, not an eyesore
customer_reviews.text: We use this to pen our English Bulldog in during the day. It gives him a little more space than a regular baby gate because of it's 3 panel design. It was easy to install and feels like good quality, and the matte brown color is much less of an eyesore than our prior white one. This works well for us. Disclaimer: our dog does not jump on it or try to get out of the pen, so I'm not sure how well it would hold up against a dog (or baby) pushing on it, etc., but it feels sturdy and is perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: If installed correctly keeps your toddler's safe, your furniture free of doggie hairs, and, your large or small pets contained.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy enough to keep my 90 lb. female Great Dane out of my formal living room. Bought a second one to keep her out of my formal dining room. They look nice in dark bronze, not cheap looking metal. My husband installed them in less than 30 minutes each but he did have to screw an inch or less piece of shim wood to secure the gates to the entry way wood trim. Can't really notice it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma V Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Completely wrong product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the gate what I purchased, am sending back all within 1 hour of receiving it. When I opened the box it only came with two extensions of maybe 5 inches in width making the gate only 38 inches wide. I needed this particular gate because I needed the extra wide and when I saw that it only opened 38 inches max I was very disappointed. It did not have the fancy top with the arched gate that swings open either. So not sure what was going on here but I did not receive the gate that I thought I was purchased. Again very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, configurable, easy to attach
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to attach. I was especially surprised and impressed with not only the sturdiness, but the ratcheting hinges which make it configurable in several positions. Also there is a release for the the hinge that attaches to the wall so the entire thing can be removed very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: lots of problems
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and flexibility of this gate and the attachable pieces, but it is difficult to attach to a wall with baseboards. I had to add a piece of wood to one of the walls to get it to reach. Also, no matter how I position it, the door does not latch properly so I have to use two hands to make it lock each time, which is inconvenient. Also, it is too short for a 40 pound dog. I'm going to have to replace it with a taller gate, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Instructor in Nevada

customer_reviews.title: Great gate
customer_reviews.text: Love this gate. I have an opening that has a wall on one side and a fair pillar on the other side so a regular gate that went straight across would not work for me. I had to install this gate at a wonky angle to accommodate the pillar plus I have 1/2 inch thick trim that is also very tall. This gate adjusted to it all. It was very easy to install and I didn't even need to is shims. It's been up for several weeks and has been working fine. The only thing that would make it better would be if the door swung both ways.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Here’s the deal. Barrier is three hinged panels. Is your opening is less than the full width you hinge or bow the panels to fit the space. Description and photos were not clear on that point. Barrier is well constructed from quality materials so I expect it to last a few years in our outdoor installation.
customer_reviews.author: Alan T

customer_reviews.title: How did the dog get out??
customer_reviews.text: Love this gate!!! We have a new pup that is 4.5 pounds and that's about as big as she will be, and she is an escape artist!! Since getting this gate she has escaped once! That's pretty good!!! Looks nice, is durable, and easy to install. And you know where to find your dog!!! Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: GamingLadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, good looking, well-made gate
customer_reviews.text: I installed this across a 48” wide opening to a room that is off a circular atrium. The jambs are angled 60 degrees to the walls, not the standard 90 degrees and the baseboards are 6” high. I shortened the width of the side panels by 8” each so the gate wouldn’t project too far into the room, but this wasn’t necessary. (Width adjustment is achieved with hinges on the side panels.) The gate is self closing and works flawlessly. Easy to unlock with one hand. The construction and finish is good. I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeper

customer_reviews.title: Great look and quality, wish it didn't have to be screwed in to the wall
customer_reviews.text: I bought it thinking there would be a tension element built in and we wouldn't have to screw it in, but upon further inspection of the description I see that it says it has to be wall mounted, so I haven't docked any stars for my poor reading skills. I love the product (we didn't screw it in, we have an apartment) but my dog can't really push it over.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and beautiful. We use for our Great Dane, Bassett Hound and our Blue Nose Pit puppy. We gotten compliments on its looks. Gate is big enough for a full size Great Dane to walk through easily. Puppy can't climb the rails. We're going to be buying this product for smaller doorways in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: simplymeinmo

customer_reviews.title: Great gate!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Installation couldn't have been easier. Because of how it's made, there were many configuration possibilities. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Update: March 2019 Had this gate about the years now. It has really held up well. Still looking like new and still functions as it should. I really like the quick release function that allows you to completely remove the gate at the push of a button when you need to. Update:. I've now had this gate over three years and it is still functioning like new. One of the best purchases I've ever made on Amazon. It was easy to bring with me when I moved to a different place.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostflite

customer_reviews.title: Great gate, pleasing to the eye and fairly easy install.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and somewhat easy to install. It does require screws and anchors which some other tension gates do not require, but this was the best fit for a wide entryway with an irregular shape to the frame due to the nearby staircase. It does not feel quite as sturdy as our tension gates, but that is solely due to the hinge on the gate that is needed for it to have its flexibility in position and shape. I would highly recommend this for anyone that has a wider entry door or need a a gate that is angled forward.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Drilled sturdy mount
customer_reviews.text: You’ll need to screw the mounts into the wall. It’s sturdy, it’s easy to open (for an adult/human), and the design allows for some movement The two parts on the side of the gate door are fixed length, but they’re on a swivel, meaning it can either be set up to be in a perfectly straight line for the max width, or you can set it up in a curved way (if that makes sense) Regardless, your dog won’t be knocking this thing over at all. Keep in mind that you will be drilling 10 holes into your door frames to set this up
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best gate ever
customer_reviews.text: Best gate ever!!! Really easy to open with just one hand and it will shut automatically. But you can also open it up all the way and it will stay open. It is rather heavy but that helps it stay in place. Am using this for my little doggie (5 lbs) and she cannot get through the slats. If I don't like it click shut, she has learned to put her nose in the opening and walk right through. I have a really smart dog - sometimes not such a good thing. Two other people have also bought this gate. Other gates are harder to open and I wanted one really easily opened. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice gate!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I'd buy it again, in a minute! Safe! Sturdy! Rigid! Latch is superior compared to other cheaper models. Packed properly. Shipped promptly. Color is true to advertisement. Size is true. Value is absolute.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas G.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gate! It's self closing, sturdy, and easy to install, it is the screw in the wall type gate, not the pressure type gate. My 1 year old tries to open it but is unable to, perfect! We even took off one of the poles to have our small chihuahua come through, "doggy door" lol. Would recommend this product highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina V. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great gate, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my front porch, so my dogs don’t run off when I sit outside. It was easy to install, simply had to unfold it and set up the mounts. There was even a really handy paper strip with it, so I could mark the height of the mounts. It’s sturdy and looks good. My neighbors and even complimented me on it’s look and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy A. C.

customer_reviews.title: A quality gate, will work for now.
customer_reviews.text: We love: -the bronze finish to match our homes décor -the locking mechanism -the style of gate -the height of the gate -the quality -that the gate can open in different sections We dislike: -that the gate isn't really 72" wide -that we had to install the gate above our base boards so now it sits off the floor Overall, we are happy with our purchase. We had to install additional boards to accommodate our weirdly shaped doorframe but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: TFam2014

customer_reviews.title: Dog mom
customer_reviews.text: This gate is amazing and stylish! I needed a gate to keep my dog from running out the door. But my opening was odd and most gates are narrow and aren't help when bringing in grocery bags. This gate met all my needs! Plus it didn't break the bank! Omg this gate! I want to give it 10 stars! So we have had to move furniture and take it through the gate. Well it also unclips from the wall mounts making is super easy to take down temporarily. Where were they when we had little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Good gate but hard to block off any larger opening
customer_reviews.text: Did the job for a wide space needing a gate. Looked good doing so as well. But because the space IS wide, and the amount of side support for the gate limited, the gate itself isn’t as strong as a gate would be for a narrower space. This observation is not meant to be a negative one for this product, just the nature of trying to span a larger opening.
customer_reviews.author: researchhound

product_meta.title: Toddleroo by North States 72” wide Deluxe Décor Baby Gate: Sturdy extra wide baby gate with one hand operation. Hardware Mount. Fits 38.3 - 72” Wide. (30" Tall, Matte Bronze)
product_meta.description: Color:Matte BronzeTransform your home, so the fun never has to end, with the Toddleroo by North States Deluxe Decor Gate. Offering added security and style for large openings, the exclusive matte bronze finish is designed for exceptional richness, durability and depth of color while its solidly constructed from the highest-quality materials to withstand rigorous day in, day out use. The easy one-hand operation and stay-open feature is sure to assist any busy parent. For additional security, this gate offers one swinging walk-through panel built with a childproof double-locking system. This gate panel is an extra-wide 25.5 inches wide making it the perfect size for the entire family. To keep the gate panel open, simply use the hold-open feature to prevent the gate from closing. When the gate is not in use, simply swing it out of the way. The Deluxe Decor Gate hardware mounts on straight or angled walls using pivot points on the gate panels. It's ideal for a variety of room openings measuring 38.3 to 72 inches wide and is 30 inches high. The Deluxe Decor Gate has an additional 15 inch extension (product number 4938, sold separately). Adding 6 of these extensions will expand the gate up to 162 inches wide. The 15 inch extension is available under product number 4938. The added security and peace of mind that this gate provides is sure to please.
feature_bullets: NEW NAME - SAME GREAT BRAND YOU TRUST: Worry-free safety! Toddleroo by North States Deluxe Décor Gate is ideal for a variety of openings. It shuts firmly yet easily with one simple push, keeping your child safe and secure. Safe for babies 6-24 months.
SAFE & SECURE: Keep your loved ones safe with this hardware mounted gate that's perfect for extra-wide openings. Mounts to straight and angled walls and can be used around fireplaces.
STYLISH AND DEPENDABLE: The exclusive matte bronze finish will complement any home decor while its heavy-duty metal construction is built to last!

LOADED WITH CONVENIENT FEATURES: Safety gate opens easily with one hand and offers a childproof double-locking system for peace of mind. To keep the child gate open for multiple pass throughs, simply use the hold-open feature to prevent the gate from closing.

ADJUSTABLE FOR A VARIETY OF SPACES: This gate can be used in spaces measuring 38.3 to 72 inches wide, and is 30 inches high. Need a longer gate? No problem! Up to six additional 15 inch extensions (sold separately) can be added to expand the gate to up to 162”.

specifications.Safety warning: Check the included instruction manual for a complete list of safety warnings. You will also find the PDF of the manual on the Amazon listing
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,263 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
